help-file.title: CONSTRUCT
help-file.content:
Construct is the basis for building both houses and guildhalls. Funds must be kept on hand while using this command. It takes a varying amount of money and time to construct something, dependent on where you would like to build it. Everything is saved through a crash, though, so fear not.
construct guildhall Cost: varies on terrain This will construct your guildhall on the current worldmap location you are standing on. Only Leaders have this ability. The guildhall will be a down exit from your current location and will consist of two rooms.
construct room <exit dir> <door|nodoor> [door keyword] Cost: 1k This option will build a room with an exit from the room you are standing in into the new room. You must use a valid exit direction <n s e w> and tell it if you want a door or nodoor. If you want a door, you should specify the keyword. e.g.: construct n door curtain Note: The doors are bugged, do not use them
Once you have the initial building in place, there are various addictions available for you.
construct name <Ansi room name> Cost: 50 Names the current room. You are able to use ANSI color in this.
construct describe Cost: 10 This option will put you into the edit system similar to bulletin boards, and when you are done will set the description of the room appropriately.
construct inn Cost: 5k Builds an inn in the current room. Only one inn is allowed per guildhall.
construct heal Cost: 3k Builds a accelerated healing room in the current room.
construct teleporter <target> Cost: 20k Builds a teleporter between two halls. You must have a target standing in the room of the other hall, and this command will build the teleporter from your room to his room and back. A guild may have up to 2 teleporters per hall, but the guildhall must contain 10 rooms before a teleporter can be placed within it.
construct mouth DISABLED Cost: 500 Builds a magic mouth in current room. This acts as an alarm and will broadcast when someone not in your guild is in that room. Only one magic mouth can be built per guildhall.
construct fountain Cost: 500 Builds a fountain in current room. Only one fountain of any type may be built per guildhall.
construct holy|unholy Cost: 3k Builds a holy/unholy fountain in the current room. Only one fountain of any type may be built per guildhall.
construct cabinet DISABLED Cost: 2,500 This option will create a cabinet in the house (not available for use in guildhalls, please use construct chest), allowing you to store things in it. Any number of cabinets can be built.
construct chest Cost: 5k Builds a chest in the current room. Any number of chests may be in each room and guildhall. Note: Most chest functions are better served with lockers in hometowns.
construct shop Cost: 10k Builds a shop in the current room.
construct secret entrance DISABLED Cost: 10,000 This option will hide the entrance to your house (not available for guildhalls).
construct cleric | mage | warrior Cost: 10k Used to construct mage, cleric, or warrior golems. Golems will be placed in the entryway of your guild, no matter where you execute this command. Only 4 golems can be built per guildhall.
Note: Many commands may now be used to move options from one room to another. Doing a new "construct fountain" for example will cost 0, and will move the fountain spot to your current room. All moves of this sort will take place the next time the game reboots.
